scripts.build:cf: npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build --openNextConfigPath ./open-next.config.ts && cp .open-next/worker.js .open-next/assets/_worker.js && cp -r .open-next/cloudflare .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/server-functions .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/middleware .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/.build .open-next/assets/ && node -e "const r={version:1,include:['/*'],exclude:['/_next/static/*','/favicon.ico','/_next/image*']};require('fs').writeFileSync('.open-next/assets/_routes.json',JSON.stringify(r))"
scripts.deploy: npm run build:cf && wrangler pages deploy .open-next/assets --project-name wokpost --branch main
